title.narrative: F.a: SOCO office PMER support for the Country Programme

description.narrative: Somalia represents one of the most critical fragile states in the world. It is one of the most difficult environments to undertake project monitoring, with conflict and security presenting significant challenges to FCA and our partners. Addressing these ch allenges is an immediate priority and one on which we have already scaled up our efforts on recent programme interventions. Working with the local partners successfully requires working hand in hand throughout the project cycle.The FCA programme has consid erably grown during the past year in Somalia. The fast growth brings several new challenges in terms of transparency and accountability, with a special focus on how to properly manage the operations in the field in such a volatile scenario. This project is linked to FCA's overall goals/strategy in terms of strengthening programme quality in order to achieve better effectiveness, transparency and accountability.The office will be focusing on the set up of proper and efficient standard operating procedures in Somalia, including coordination mechanism, MEAL (monitoring, evaluation, accountability and learning) system and safety and security platform. The overall objective of the Country Office is to improve effectiveness, quality, and impact of the FCA Country Programme focusing on the thematic areas through established field presence. Activities: ? Strategic and operational planning for the country ? Programme and project PME and administrative support ? Planning and monitoring of the country programme and proj ects ? Provision of thematic advice to the country programme and projects ? Building the institutional capacity of local partners ? Facilitate dialogue with authorities and various actors at a country level ? Networking at both country and regional level ? Intensification of cooperation with other stakeholders ? Ensuring support and input for communication purposes ? Broadening the access to funding opportunities ? Coordination of work and cooperation with other aid organisations ? Ensuring increased input of partner organisations and topics from the region into the lobby and advocacy work ? Resourcing and staffing of the Country Office? Further strengthening of the management and administration of the Country Office? Security assessments + evaluationsRights -holders /beneficiaries: ? FCA Staff? Local Partners' Staff?
